column1: + 50 people were killed because of the new coronavirus in the city of Qom, in Iran, a figure that if confirmed would be higher than the official balance that was known so far and that feeds rumors of a possible concealment of the real extent of the outbreak in the country.
The head of the World Health Organization warned Monday that the world should work harder to contain the spread of the deadly new coronavirus, and should prepare for a "potential pandemic."
